response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and add value to your endeavors. The product is valued at $1,000,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and aims to provide you with an opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable discount. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
